task.title: Cheesy Scrambled Eggs Recipe
task.shortdesc: This recipe is for eggs and toast, and it can be paired with any choosings of your liking, fruits, your choice of meat, etc.

taskbody.prereq:
Materials for this recipe include a bowl, a skillet, and a stovetop. The ingredients are as follows:
2-4 large free-range eggs (depending on your appetite)
pinch of sea salt
pinch of black pepper
splash of milk
butter
shredded cheese of your choice
slice of bread (and jelly if you like)

step.cmd: Crack your eggs into a bowl.
Add a pinch of sea salt and black pepper into the bowl, as well as a splash of milk for ultimate creaminess.
Beat the eggs together with a fork.
Put a small skillet over a low heat, and drop in a knob of butter.
Melt the butter slowly until it's frothy. While the butter is melting, pop a slice of bread in the toaster.
Sprinkle as much cheese as you would like, and stir slowly using a wooden spoon or spatula, bringing in all the mixture from the edges of the pan.
When the eggs look silky and slightly runny, put them on a plate.
Put butter or jelly on your toast (or you can put your eggs on top and add another slice to make a sandwich) and enjoy!
